name: BelittleMe
0:
”Alexa, ask Belittle Me to make me feel smaller”
”Alexa, open Belittle Me”
”Alexa, ask Belittle Me to tell me a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: belittle me
des:
Life comes with problems, that's an unavoidable fact. Sometimes, it can be helpful to remove yourself from a situation and look at the world around you: realize how small we all are compared to everything. Hopefully, that belittling will make your problems seem less as well.

This skill will help you with that by providing various facts making you -- and consequently your problems -- feel a bit smaller. 

If you like the skill, make sure to leave a comment and review!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
